nameEntry.part: Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph
Archives of the Sisters of St Joseph

biogHist.abstract: The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph of the Sacred Heart hold the official records of the Congregation dating back to its foundation in the 1800's. The archives held the records of several children's homes in New South Wales that had been operated by the Sisters of St Joseph. In 2013 the Sisters transferred their records to CatholicCare Adoption Services in Bankstown. CatholicCare Adoption Services should be contacted for access to records relating to children who spent time in homes run by the Sisters of St Joseph.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: St Margaret's Home for Unwed Mothers (1894 - 1982)
Admission Forms (dates uncertain), St Joseph's Girls' Home (1880? - 1979?)

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph held the records of St Joseph's Girls' Home until 2013, when they were transferred to CatholicCare Adoption Services. All requests for information should be made to CatholicCare Adoption Services.

The Sisters of St Joseph managed the records of St Joseph's Girls' Home until January 2013, when they were transferred to CatholicCare Adoption Services. Contact CatholicCare Adoption Services for information about these records.

The Sisters of St Joseph managed the records of St Joseph's Providence until January 2013, when they were transferred to CatholicCare Adoption Services. Contact CatholicCare Adoption Services for information about these records.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Sisters of Saint Joseph of the Sacred Heart (1872 - )
Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph - Contact Details

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of the Sisters of St Joseph managed the records of Kincumber Orphanage until 20 November 2012. These records are now with CatholicCare Adoption Services.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Register of Children, St Joseph's Orphanage, Kincumber (1887 - 1976)

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of the Sisters of St Joseph held the records of St Joseph's Orphanage Kincumber until 20 November 2012, when they were transferred to CatholicCare Adoption Services.

The Sisters of St Joseph managed the records of St Martha's Home until April 2013, when they were transferred to CatholicCare Adoption Services. Contact CatholicCare Adoption Services for information about these records.
The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph held and managed the records of St Martha's Home until April 2013, when they were transferred to CatholicCare Adoption Services.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Notifications of Discharge (incomplete), St Joseph's Home, Croydon (1931 - 1979)

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph held the records of St Joseph's Home Croydon until April 2013, when the records were moved to CatholicCare Adoption Services Bankstown. All requests for information about these records should be made to CatholicCare Adoption Services.

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph held the records of St Joseph's Home Croydon until April 2013, when the records were moved to CatholicCare Adoption Services Bankstown. All requests for information about these records should be made to CatholicCare Adoption Services.

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph held the records of St Joseph's Home Croydon until April 2013, when the records were moved to CatholicCare Adoption Services Bankstown. All requests for information about these records should be made to CatholicCare Adoption Services.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Personal Record Cards (dates uncertain), St Joseph's Home for Children, Croydon (1925? - 1979?)

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph held the records of St Joseph's Home Croydon until April 2013, when the records were moved to CatholicCare Adoption Services Bankstown. All requests for information about these records should be made to CatholicCare Adoption Services.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: Admission Registers, St Joseph's Girls' Home (1880 - 1979)

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph held the records of St Joseph's Girls' Home until 2013, when they were transferred to CatholicCare Adoption Services. All requests for information should be made to CatholicCare Adoption Services.

cpfRelation.relationEntry: St Joseph's Home for Children, Croydon (1925 - 1981)

descriptiveNote.p: The Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph held and managed the records of St Joseph's Home for Children from 1979 to 2013. They were then transferred to CatholicCare Adoption Services, Bankstown.

CatholicCare Adoption Services manages access to records relating to children's homes that had been previously been held by the Archives of Mary MacKillop and the Sisters of St Joseph. The transfer of these records started in November 2012 and was completed in April 2013.
